name: Kosekai Escape Room V1
description:
*****Highly Recommended to play on PC instead of mobile.*****

Welcome to the Kosekai Escape Room game! This game is not for the faint of heart. Do you accept the challenge, adventurer? 

Also... if you would like to send a tip in ETH, please send it to the wallet address below! Thank you for your support and generosity.

0xA83333119dE215d4955Dc3162ce33F44504c51C6

*****Best played on a computer browser*****

Please let me know which browsers you are experiencing issues on. Try Microsoft Edge if you get errors on Chrome.

On browser controls

Use Arrow Keys or Mouse left-click to move

Use Esc or Mouse right-click to bring up the menu

Use Spacebar/Enter or Mouse left-click to interact

Mobile Users

One finger tap to move & select

Two-finger tap to cancel/backspace/bring up the menu

Leave a comment if you discover any bugs or have any improvements. 

Big shoutout to Alynderey, Nopsy, Snomo, & Akuto for all of the ideas, pictures, story, support, and testing. This game would not have been possible without all the help from you guys. Thank you!

Enjoy and have fun!

-M4YHAM
